attributes.additional_details:
The problem is now out of hand , job agency are all uploading there jobs to jobsearch.gov to the point were it is just out of control spam.

Im we'll aware there are agencys out there if i want to use them but i dont i came to jobsearch.gov because ive had enough of my time being wasted i wanted some hastle free job searching but no.

Every other job is an agency job will little to no information of location wage dutys or contact

there acting as a money hungry middle man in a place were people are genuienly looking for work and its digusting.

Everyone moans about unemployment but im not suprised when 5 minutes on your site makes me want to shut down my pc.

REMOVE THE AGENCY MIDDLE MEN FROM JOBSEARCH.GOV IMMEDIATELY !!! SO WE CAN ACTUALLY APPLY FOR SOME JOB DIRECTLY AND FIND WHAT WERE LOOKING FOR.
